q1: What do you think of the Barcelona players now?
a1: They have a great team now
q2: Tell me more about the team.
a2: Futbol Club Barcelona, commonly known as Barcelona and familiarly as Barça, is a professional football club based in Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain.
q3: Best club in Europe, with a storied history. Do your research and you will see they are a different club ever since they hired Johan Cruyff as their manager.
a4: A while back they hired him!
